summary: Adds a new follower named Rhea Storm-Blade to the game. Located in The Banned Mare in Whiterun. More detail in description.
descriptionHtml:
Rhea is a new follower added to the Banned Mare in Whiterun. She is a nord who will level up with and starts at level 10. She uses CBBE body and Ks Hairdos. She is not marriageable or recruitable for the Blades. These feature may appear in future mods but as this is my first I am going to keep it simple. She uses female commander for a voice and Default combat style.
 Credits: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] by Caliente
      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT Physics[/url] by Stealthic and Kalilies
      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot and LogRamm
This is my first attempt so any advice is appreciated and I hope to be creating more mods. Where this is my first attempt bugs will most likely be present so please let me know if anything is wrong and I will attempt a fix thanks. Please comment any bugs, conflictions, questions and anything else thanks. Enjoy!
author: Dks1
